t: Visual Search
s: Tap on the ‘Upload a photo’ ... to shop similar products on Amazon. On uploading an image, you will see one dot for each item we detected. You can also circle around an item to search. To search a specific item in the photo, you can circle around the item. In cases the item is blurry or too small, we may not be able to recognize it.
